content: Glide through various terrains with ease while riding atop your very own personal hovercraft. The ergonomic design allows for easy handling and boasts top speeds of 15 MPH over concrete, asphalt, grass, and shallow wet areas.

Skillfully prepare any drink order that comes your way with help from the bar tools box. No matter where you go, all your accoutrements are organized and at hand so you can always find the tool you’re looking for when concocting drinks.

Sonic has raced back from the depths of obscurity to spend the holidays with you in the form of this ugly Christmas sweater. Your favorite 8-bit hedgehog is ready to make his comeback and relive the glory days as he stands amid a winter wonderland.

Create a Technicolor light show on the dance floor by sporting the eye-catching DIY rainbow LED shoes. Each shoe features two embedded force-sensitive resistors in addition to 40 LEDs that work together to create brilliant visual effects while in motion.

Challah at your boy Dr. Dreidel for all your holiday entertainment needs. The Jewish holiday of Hanukkah and rap have come together at long last to bring you this pun-tastic toy featuring a unique laser-etched portrait of Dr. Dre on every side.

Get lost in beauty of the cosmos as you gaze into the out of this world formation of the polished meteorite sphere. Discovered as a mass by Russian geologist F.A. Mednikov in 1967, each limited edition specimen is a testament to the majesty of our universe.

Put some hair on your chest and join the elite ranks of the fire drinkers after chugging a bottle of Sriracha beer. Inspired by the hottest pepper on the planet, this unique brew is the perfect way to wash down each of your meals with a spicy kick.

Pay homage to your favorite hero while providing a little ambient lighting with the Mega Man helmet replica. Mega Man’s iconic blue helmet rests on a sturdy blue base fitted with USB-powered LEDs ideal for showcasing this finely crafted collectible.

Put everyone in the house on the hot seat by interrogating them using the home lie detector test. Once connected to your laptop via USB, sensors applied to the subject’s fingers measure pulse rate to determine if they’re lying or not.

The kiddies will never be late again with the seatbelt-less jet powered school bus taking over local routes. This one of a kind yellow speed demon – affectionately dubbed “School Time” – emits huge flames from the rear and reaches speeds of up to 367 MPH.

Awaken your Dark Side and strike fear into the hearts of Rebel scum when you get your hands on the crossguard lightsaber. No matter how you feel about the redesign of the hilt, this new lightsaber is an instant must have collector’s item for Star Wars fans.

Go on a journey through our solar system – from the center to the outermost regions – with these planetary glasses. They comes brilliantly decorated like each of the planets in our solar system – including the sun and our once fellow planet, Pluto.

Tired of eating your meals alone? Let heavy breathing cat keep you company as he drools over your mouth watering meal. This small 3D printed bust of your favorite internet meme will get loads of laugh at the office and makes the ideal desktop companion.

Maximize the limited space in your backyard to the fullest by giving it an extra dimension with the hidden floor pool. Depending on what the day calls for, you’ll be able to seamlessly transition from a usable patio deck to a fully functional and refreshing pool.

Add a nautical touch to your outfit by accessorizing with the diamond octopus tentacles ring. Once the octopus’s long shiny tentacles accented by diamond encrusted suckers wrap around your fingers, you’ll never want it to let go of your hand.

titleEN: Han Solo In Carbonite Shower Curtain
content: Take a decorating cue from Jabba and style your bathroom with the Han Solo frozen in carbonite shower curtain. As you scrub yourself clean, you can take in the amazingly detailed depiction of the rogue intergalactic smuggler trapped in carbonite.

Redefine the way you travel by swapping your old luggage for the modern digital zipperless suitcase. The design gives you quick access to your belongings while other helpful features like a built-in scale, GPS tracker, and USB charger improve your travel experience.

Experience what heaven on Earth is like while you let your cares melt away in the balmy weather of the personal Fiji island rental. Just imagine Cast Away without all the despair and weird relationships with volleyballs and you’ve got paradise.

Give your muggle tree a magical touch by accenting it using some DIY golden snitch ornaments. This easy to follow guide provides detailed instructions so that you can turn any regular ornament into your very own custom crafted snitch.

Prepare your meals with the same efficiency and grace as the professionals by using the sous chef prep station. It’s designed by top rated chefs for maximum utility – providing a bamboo cutting board fitted with removable containers for storing all your ingredients.

These lumps of coal are actually milk chocolate hot chocolate balls, shaped like pieces of coal and wrapped in shiny black foil.  Each package comes with 3 lumps of coal, and a large tag to remind the recipient that they have been very naughty.

Break your diet and indulge in the Dark Side by satisfying your cravings with the contents of the Darth Vader cookie jar. Vader’s iconic all black helmet gazes upon you with a menacing stare while the airtight lid ensures your cookies remain fresh.

What better way to show your sweetie that their love sends you to the moon and back than with the topographically correct moon ring. This lovely stainless steel ring comes in various finishes and displays a tiny yet accurate image of our moon’s surface.

The outside world will become obsolete after you install the LCD video wall in your home. Instead of having to settle for a subpar big screen or dual monitor setup, you get to enjoy a mural of ultra-HD bliss that’ll revolutionize the way you watch TV.

Exact your revenge on the sadistic Gestapo agent from Raiders of the Lost Arc by setting the Indiana Jones melting Toht candle ablaze. When the candle’s lit, Toht begins his slow and agonizing demise as he melts away just like in the movie.

What better throne for the undisputed king of the home to sit on than the scorpion chair. Its beautifully sculpted wooden frame is styled like a gigantic scorpion poised to attack while the interior is lined with soft, comfy cushions that accent the chair’s ominous presence.

Liven up the living room with a touch of brilliance by accenting it using a galaxy rug. This mind blowing acrylic rug comes with a captivating image of the cosmos that lets you appreciate the scope and wonder of our immense universe.

Commemorate the first time Moses hallucinated off of the lord’s divine herbs with the burning bush magnet. The iconic religious image of Moses standing before the burning bush receives a modern day twist that reflects our society’s unique brand of humor.

Bacon comforts, nourishes, satisfies, and can even keep us warm and fashionable whilst in scarf form. Season any outfit with a hefty helping of some silk bacon and the result is an eye-catching look designed to turn heads wherever you go.

Take your favorite old school games with you wherever you go using the pocket sized retro NES emulator. This compact console features a retro Nintendo design that make this the premiere way to enjoy all your classic games on the go.

Turn your daily cup of joe into a drinkable masterpiece that would put your local barista to shame using the 3D latte art maker. The device allows you to raise the foam and then accent it with your favorite topping to create cute and cuddly little critters.

Bring a piece of the prehistoric world into your modern home by adding the dinosaur bone fragment to your collection. This ancient fossil – approximately 65 million years old – comes from the Cretacepis age of South Dakota and is an excellent gift for dino fans.

The space pirate watch is a timepiece unlike anything you’ve ever seen before. Inspired by the spaceship used by the 1970s cartoon “Captain Future”, this bold timepiece forgoes the standard circular face for a unique and fluid design that adds a twist to telling time.

Gain a new appreciation for our marvelous planet as you spend your workday entranced by the Earth spinning globe. This 4.5″ diameter globe displays a detailed and realistic image of our hospitable blue planet as it endlessly rotates on its base.

Deliver a KO to every other holiday garment out there when you sport the fashionably unfashionable Street Fighter ugly Christmas sweater. Sandwiched in between a hideous design and color scheme, the iconic Ken and Ryu battle with snowflake hadokens.

Discover the beauty that lies within heartache by illuminating your room with the neon broken heart sign. This signature Aimée Wilder piece comes in a variety of colors and sizes that make this functional piece of art a great accent for any young adult’s bedroom.

Forget about acting naughty or nice, it’s the ones who keep it real that Santa rewards with the Wu-Tang Christmas sweater. Now you’ll be able to stay warm without losing your street cred as you show your favorite rap group some love.

Three delicious flavors join forces in the camouflage ice cream to bring you a blend so delicious you’ll never see it coming. Salty caramel, rich chocolate, and a mouth watering cake flavor create a camouflage motif even more delicious than it looks.

Give your look a little flair with the shark bite earrings. Each of these little handmade sharks comes beautifully painted and designed in a way that creates the illusion the little guy just Mike Tyson’ed your earlobe with its razor sharp mini jaws.

<del>Spy on unsuspecting friends</del> Get incredible aerial footage by taking to the skies with the micro drone aerial camera. It comes equipped with a quality camera for capturing amazing shots and features a cool quadrocopter design that makes flying incredibly fun.

Deliver the zombie annihilating double tap in one swift blow with help from the double barrel assault rifle. Two separate triggers allow you to fire rounds through each barrel either simultaneously or independently for the ultimate undead killing attack.

Deflate the mood at anyone’s celebratory event by inflating the always festive pessimistic balloons. Each vibrantly colored balloon comes monogrammed with a brutally honest non-traditional message that will really undermine someone’s big day.

titleEN: Star Trek Borg Cube Keychain Flashlight
content: Assimilate yourself into the collective by toting around the Star Trek Borg cube keychain flashlight. Taking design inspiration from the TV series, this compact cube’s surface features a convenient green flashlight that activates with the push of a button.

Just one scoop is all it takes to satisfy your craving when you serve yourself using the giant ice cream scooper. This German made utensil boasts a sturdy brass handle and a humongous stainless steel scoop big enough to serve an entire pint in just one scoop.

Grab a couple of friends, a slice of pizza and suit up in the Ninja Turtles gi – because it’s crime fighting time! Whether the day calls for a battle with the Foot Clan or the evil Shredder, this durable ooze green gi will hold up perfectly as you do battle – cowabunga!

Power up your morning breakfast by enjoying a piping hot cup of coffee from the Super Mario pipe mug. This novelty ceramic mug holds up to 15 ounces of liquid and features a fun design that makes it appear as if an 8-bit tube is coming out from your table.

The tiny house on wheels proves that home isn’t where the heart is, it’s where you park it. Although this cozy home is way below the average size, it features an ultra functional design that takes advantage of every nook and cranny to provide you with everything you need.

There’s no better way to show Mr. Peanutbutter how much you adore him than by immortalizing his likeness with a personalized watercolor pet portrait. Each vibrant work turns your four legged friend into a surreal masterpiece that you’ll cherish forever.

Get on the fast track to becoming a rock god by creating your own unique sound with the guitar key hammer. When the hammer is placed on the old six string, it allows you to invent new finger-style patterns, percussive chords, and even play at blazing speeds.

Welcome new customers to your establishment in traditional Canadian fashion with this “Sorry We’re Sorry” sign. Once you begin hanging this commercially useless sign in a visible location, you’ll wonder how your business ever got along without it.

Experience a killer surfing sesh even if it’s completely flat by creating your own gnarly rides with the wave making boat. The wake produced by the boat’s motor creates small but perfectly formed waves that are perfect for surfing in lakes and rivers.

Transform your phone into a pint-sized badass by resting it on the battle robot phone stand. Complete with intricate detailing and two fearsome machine gun arms, it features a padded seat that offers your phone maximum protection while it rests on the stand.

Get a little adventurous during snack time by indulging in a delectable insect lollipop. Rather than ruin the candy with a nasty gum or tootsie roll center, this exotic delight features a perfectly intact creepy crawler patiently waiting for your tongue to caress its carcass.

Discover the wonderful world that lies beneath the water’s surface by gazing at it through the underwater illuminating microscope. This handy device sheds light on the mysterious secrets of the deep through a strategically placed waterproof flashlight.

Give your dearly departed relatives the adventure of an after-lifetime by having their cremated ashes launched into space. You’ll send them on a cosmic journey twenty miles high where they’ll be able to drift in the planet’s upper atmosphere for months!

Bring a dash of office chic into your humble abode with the rubber band pillow. Apart from adding a splash of color to the room, the hundreds of upcycled rubber bands lined along the surface give the cushion a unique texture and feel as you lay down on it.

Power up your bathroom decor by purchasing a few NES soap bars. After you’ve worked up a sweat battling against nostalgic 8-bit bad guys, only these Nintendo shaped soap bars can leave you feeling and smelling springtime fresh.

Get rip roaring drunk without arousing suspicion from those around you by storing your hooch in the hidden shorts flask. This slim plastic flask attaches comfortably to the hip and holds up to 12 ounces of your favorite poison.

Give the fashion-conscious germaphobe in your life a little piece of mind as they walk around our disease-laden streets wearing the designer surgical mask. The stylish surgical mask looks great and helps block 99.997% of airborne pathogens.

Set your humble abode apart from the rest by giving it a quaint country touch with the cow mailbox. This handcrafted item transforms your run of the mill mail receptacle into a little cute farm animal that’ll put a smile on anyone’s face as they approach your home.

Get a taste of the lavish lives of the rich and powerful by sipping on 24 karat gold white wine from your diamond encrusted chalice. This non-alcoholic delight is filled with small golden flakes whose only purpose is to drive up the price per bottle – cheers!

Experience a luxury ride that gives the term “fully loaded” a new meaning with the ultimate edition Land Rover. This tricked-out ride features a powerful and sleek body loaded with enough bells and whistles to please any luxury offroad enthusiasts.

Take a drive down memory lane without polluting the environment when you get behind the wheel of the electric motor Volkswagen Beetle. The original Bug is back and revamped for the 21st century with an all electric motor that packs a punch buggy punch.

Restore order to the clusterfuck of cables and wires powering your appliances using some cable labels. Now instead of having to guess which wire goes to what gadget, you can simply read the small label to easily and quickly find what you’re looking for.

Wave goodbye to traffic jams as you hover over the crowded roads piloting the flying car. This sporty two seater boasts both land and aerial capabilities allowing for maximum maneuverability as you transition from busy roads to the open skies.

Immortalize the greatest movie ever filmed – but that’s just like, our opinion, man – by decorating your home with the Big Lebowski paintings. These incredibly detailed masterpieces depict some of the cult movie’s most famous scenes.

Transform the vermin living in your walls into hilarious little action figures using the mouse taxidermy kit. After little Nibbles meets his fate at the hands of the mouse trap, you’ll be able to stuff him and keep him around for the whole family to enjoy.

Experience the most delicious night of sleep of your life by laying down on the pepperoni pizza bed set. This appetizing bed set comes emblazoned with a mouth watering pepperoni cheese pizza graphic so realistic you can practically see the grease dripping to the floor.

Ensure the perimeter remains secure at all times by placing the giant killer robot on the job. Standing at a daunting 9-1/2″ feet, this nearly 900 pound robot greets everyone he encounters with an icy cold stare that’ll make them think twice about approaching uninvited.

Craft custom made pieces of jewelry fit for Poseidon’s queen with the pearl filled oysters. The moment your significant other opens the oyster, she’ll be greeted to a captivating pearl available in either a pink, white, or purple hue.

Celebrate another year of life with a grim scene of our post apocalyptic world by using the zombie cake mold to bake a delicious treat. The mold lets you create tombstones, small skulls and various living dead corpses breaking through the ground.

When LOTR fans are looking for comfort there’s one pillow to rule them all! – the one ring pillow. This custom made pillow is crafted using both Brazilian wool and synthetic felts for unsurpassed comfort, emblazoned with the iconic writing.

What do you get the man that has everything? You get him the glass top ping pong table, of course! This handmade luxury ping pong table sports a sleek metallic black frame complemented by a glass top that provides a unique playing experience.

To purchase the crystal skull or not, that is the question. This Hamlet inspired skull comes skillfully crafted with an eerily captivating and realistic human cranium design ideal for adding a touch of elegance and pizzazz to any room.

In the automotive world, there are fast cars and then there’s the Nemesis RR supercar. This American made marvel of engineering comes with a staggering 2000 horsepower twin turbo charged V8 engine that can propel you from 0-60 in 2.8 seconds.

Reward others for their stupidity by giving them a customized message ribbon. This cute as a button 6″ satin ribbon features a lovely pleated rosette border and allows you to get creative with a variety of colors and styles.

Smash every ghoul and boogie man lurking in the shadows with the Hulk 3D wall light. The light mounts onto the wall, creating the illusion that the Hulk has clobbered his way through to spread some of his Gamma radiation around the room.

The flux capacitor dial watch is the  sleek, modern, and versatile watch you can program entirely with your smartphone. The time is displayed only when you twist your wrist in front of you and includes other helpful features like a flashlight and a chronometer.

Transform a relatively healthy snack into an incredibly fattening yet delicious treat with the banana corer and filler. This handy tools lets you remove the banana’s core so you can fill it with your favorite toppings like gooey caramel or creamy chocolate.

Brighten up your drab wardrobe with a splash of color with the tie dye cutoff shorts. These trendy cutoffs feature a comfortable relaxed fit accented with a multitude of vibrant colors designed in a retro tie dye motif that’ll make your outfit pop.

Outrun disaster and avoid certain death riding through the streets on the apocalypse survival motorized bike. This trusty bike comes outfitted with a universal rack for bolting on nearly anything you can imagine and boasts a gas tank capable of taking you up to 500 miles.

Appease the dark lords of rock and roll by busting out and epic solo on the skull and crossbones guitar. The guitar boasts a demon summoning frame in the form of a skull and crossbones that’ll make you the center of attention at any gig.

Keep your phone’s touchscreen smudge free at all times by accenting your suit with a microfiber lined tie. Each of these fashionable ties will keep you looking dapper and come with a custom microfiber lined back ideal for cleaning the screen of your mobile device.

Take your hot tubbing to the next level by transforming your backyard with the luxury double decker spa. This monster sized spa spoils guests with a flurry of lights, comfortable seating and shooting jets that place this two level spa in a league of its own.

Commemorate our nation’s defining moments through alternate history like only a Sci-Fi aficionado can with the Star Wars American history prints. You’ll get to relive all of our nation’s greatest triumphs such as the storming of the Death Star at Normandy beach.

Walk around with a contemporary masterpiece on your feet by wearing the Jackson Pollock styled sneakers. These stylish leather kicks feature an abstract and eye catching design composed of dozens of multicolored paint splatters to give your outfit a little more edge.

Set your fiestas apart from the rest with the interactive LED beer pong table. These sturdy aluminum tables are portable, lightweight, and come adorned with insanely bright and eye-catching designs made entirely out of LED lights.

Explore the high seas like never before by embarking on your mini voyage with the inflatable sailboat. This portable vessel’s small size is ideal for sailing aficionados who enjoy a little solo adventure where they can be alone with their thoughts and the elements.

When life has you down, sit back and enjoy a cool drink courtesy of the Buddha ice mold. While his massive size helps keep your drink chilled for longer without watering it down, his jubilant expression reminds you to enjoy the little things in life – like alcohol.

Give Mittens the secluded hangout he’s always wanted by installing the double decker cat complex in your humble abode. The minimalist design works with any room’s decor while providing your kitty with a cool little multilevel nook to relax in.

Make teatime memorable with the topographic tea table. Layers of laminated plywood accentuate the undulating form through alternating dark and light seams to create  a serene landscape with carved niches and plateaus to accommodate the tea set.

Get that photoshopped physique you’ve always dreamed of by staring at yourself through the funhouse mirrors. The unique design creates a distorted and comical image of your body while giving the room an entertaining carnival-like feel.

Help protect Spot during his nighttime walks by outfitting him with the light up dog collar. This custom leash’s stylish and functional design features bright LED strips along the collar’s surface designed to keep your pup visible in dimly lit environments.

Slay hordes of the undead when you hit the post apocalyptic streets driving the zombie hunting Jeep. This custom made vehicle comes crafted with the latest in zombie killing technology so you and your small rag tag band of survivors can thrive.

Stimulate the senses as you light up the room with the blown glass bubbles chandelier. This abstract lighting fixture is comprised out of dozens of small glass blown bubbles that illuminate in unison and create a magical warm glow when lit.

Set your coin collection apart from the rest by incorporating some hand carved nickels. Now instead of having to contend with Jefferson’s stern stare, you can gaze at a killer looking Native American skull with braids, among many other designs available.

Keep your canine occupied for hours on end with the laser collar pet toy. This novelty collar comes with a fully functional laser you can activate when you need some time away from your furry friend constantly pawing and jumping at you.

Give your home a trippy atmosphere by redecorating the place with the illusion carpet. These one of a kind designs offer abstract and contemporary patterns that play clever tricks on the mind by creating the illusion that the floor is caving in.

Cure your loneliness by snuggling up with your favorite Pokemon every night on the Pikachu bed. Once this giant Pikachu is sprawled out on the floor his soft and coushiony body provide the ideal resting spot to catch some Z’s.

Train for a nuclear apocalypse by recreating some chaotic conditions using the tactical smoke grenade. This professional grade grenade is the same kind used in movies, and is designed to pump out a whopping 40,000 cubic feet of smoke.
